Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chestnut/Mies Van DerRhoe
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Michigan, and Delaware due to street blockage near Chestnut/Mies Van DerRhoe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Michigan, and Delaware due to street blockage near Chestnut/Mies Van DerRhoe.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Addison/Orange
ShortDescription: Westbound 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Forest Preserve Dr. and Panama: due to, street blockage near Addison/Orange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Forest Preserve Dr. and Panama: due to, street blockage near Addison/Orange.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Oak Park due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Oak Park due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
